name: Escapegoat
effectText: When your opponent activates a card or effect that targets a monster(s) you control, except a Token: You can Tribute 1 monster; Special Summon 1 "Escapegoat Token" (Beast/EARTH/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0) in Defense Position. If a non-Token monster(s) you control would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can destroy 1 Token in your Monster Zone instead.
